Title: The Job Interview
Director: Sid Burston, Ernest Serrano, Philip Thornton
Writer: Betty Burston, Sid Burston, Ronald H. Gray, Ernest Serrano, Michelle Serrano
Actors: Dawna Lee Heising, Patrice Fisher, Michael Joseph Pierce, Howard Hewett
Plot: Three powerful men have been invited to a meeting which will change one of their lives forever. Money and power are all they care about. They fear no man. They will come to fear "The Job Interview".
